official-title.#text: To prohibit waivers relating to compliance with the work requirements for the program of block grants to States for temporary assistance for needy families, and for other purposes.

attestation-date.#text: Passed the House of Representatives March 13, 2013.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Preserving the Welfare Work Requirement and TANF Extension Act of 2013
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Preserving the Welfare Work Requirement and TANF Extension Act of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Prohibition on TANF waivers relating to compliance with the TANF work requirements

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Secretary of Health and Human Services

text.#text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the

Finalize, implement, enforce, or otherwise take any action to give effect to the Information Memorandum dated July 12, 2012 (Transmittal No. TANF–ACF–IM–2012–03), or to any administrative action relating to the same subject matter set forth in the Information Memorandum or that reflects the same or similar policies as those set forth in the Information Memorandum.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: to be regarded as an allowable use of funds under that program for any period.

text.#text: Authorize, approve, renew, modify, or extend any experimental, pilot, or demonstration project under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: that waives compliance with a requirement of

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 1115 of the Social Security Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: or that provides authority for an expenditure which would not otherwise be an allowable use of funds under a State program funded under
with respect to compliance with the work requirements in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: part A of title IV of such Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: that is granted before the date of the enactment of this Act is hereby rescinded and shall be null and void.

text.#text: Any waiver relating to the subject matter set forth in the Information Memorandum or described in

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}fund.#tail: for such purpose. Grants and payments may be made pursuant to this authority on a quarterly basis through the first quarter of fiscal year 2014 at the level provided for such activities for the corresponding quarter of fiscal year 2012.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}fund.#text: such sums as may be necessary

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 1108(b) of the Social Security Act

header.#text: Extension of the temporary assistance for needy families program and related programs through December 31, 2013
